downloadMessage.message: Download iCloud for Windows to use iCloud Bookmarks.

extDescription.message: Keep your Chrome bookmarks on Windows up to date with the Safari bookmarks on your iPhone, iPad and Mac.

metroMessage.description: Message displayed when loaded in metro mode
metroMessage.message: This extension requires that Chrome is running in desktop mode. Click the Chrome menu and select "Relaunch Chrome on the desktop".

signinMessage.message: Sign in to iCloud to use iCloud Bookmarks.

syncedMessage.message: Your Chrome bookmarks are synced with iCloud.

unsupportedOS.message: The extension you are trying to install is designed to run on Windows 7 or 8. If you are using a Mac, your Safari bookmarks will automatically sync with your iPhone, iPad and Mac when you sign in to iCloud on all your devices.
